attributes.action: Introduce fair representation of minority races in English football refereeing.
attributes.additional_details: To set a motion to debate the above and task minister of sports to engage relevant authorities to address the above inequality. I have no doubt there's many people who see sense in this as it is one way blacks can feel included especially after recent events surrounding BLM movement.
attributes.background: Considering the positive contribution made by blacks and other minority races in English football (both at national and domestic level) in the last 2 decades, it's both unfair and unjustified that we are yet to see more ethnic minorities particularly blacks refereeing in English top tier football.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the footballing authorities.
